select comments_seq.nextval from dual
insert into comments values( #{no}, #{board_no}, #{member_no}, sysdate, #{content}, #{register_ip}, 1 )
mapper.update: update comments set content = #{content}, modify_date = sysdate where no =#{no}
mapper.select: select comments.no, member.no as memberNo, member.name, comments.register_date, comments.content from comments join board on (comments.board_no = board.no) join member on (member.no = comments.member_no) where comments.board_no = #{board_no} order by comments.no
